name: Curbside Pickup
headline: Provides email notifications to shoppers and store staff to facilitate curbside pickup orders.
overview: This app allows shoppers and store staff to coordinate curbside pickup orders through email notifications. This improves the multi-channel experience and facilitates the pickup process by providing real-time interactions between store staff and shoppers.
features: Sends emails to shopper and store staff in each stage of the curbside pickup process
Adds comments in the order timeline as a curbside pickup order reaches each stage
